text: A lot of music you might listen to is pretty vapid, it doesn't always deal with our deeper issues. These are the things I'm interested in now, particularly at my age.
author: Annie Lennox

text: I love to make music and stay grounded.
author: Annie Lennox

text: I only want to make music because I have a passion for it.
author: Annie Lennox

text: I always think I'm the Tom Cruise of music - a lot of success and fans, but no critics, darling.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

text: Music is a part of my life all the time - on the plane, before matches, driving out to the court.
author: Maria Sharapova
